extension.summary: Browse and launch roms and standalones.
extension.description:
Current features: * filter games by console, genre, year and publisher * launch roms with an external emulator * configure script via xml file * simple but configurable description file parser * view different images and videos per game * view game plot and additional game properties
Note: This script needs some configuration. Please have a look at the commented config.xml in RCBs database directory or check http://code.google.com/p/romcollectionbrowser for complete documentation.
